reviewText: I don't know who wrote the review posted above, but it's for a completely different movie. Berlin Calling is about the trials and tribulations of a Berlin based DJ in the early yaers of this millenium. Great movie.

Hey makers of this film. There are MANY MANY of us in America that would like to buy this, but don't have a DVD player that will play these PAL encoded videos. How long must we be forced to wait until we can purchase a NTSC encoded version?
